DIVISION_NAME_SUBTITLE: (Name of the relevant division in which the candidate is listed in the voter list)
DISTRICT_NAME_SUBTITLE: (Name of the relevant district in which the candidate is listed in the voter list)
UPAZILA_SUBTITLE: (Name of the relevant upazila/thana in which the candidate is listed in the voter list)
CITY_CORPORATION_SUBTITLE: (Name of the relevant city corporation/municipality/cantonment board/union in which the candidate is listed in the voter list)
UNION_WARD_SUBTITLE: (Name of the relevant union/ward in which the candidate is listed in the voter list)
CONSTITUENCY_AREA_SUBTITLE: (Name of the constituency area of the candidate)

ANNOUNCEMENT_FIRST_PART.NATIONAL_ELECTION: <d>(1) I hereby declare that-</d><d>(a) I have consented to the above nomination and am eligible to be elected as a member of the parliament under Article 66(1) of the Constitution of the People's Republic of Bangladesh.</d><d>(b) I am not disqualified for being elected or to remain as a member under Article 66(2) of the Constitution of the People's Republic of Bangladesh and the Representation of the People Order, 1972.</d><d>(c) I have not submitted nomination papers for more than three electoral areas.</d><d>(2) I have attached an affidavit with the nomination paper.</d><d>(3) I have attached details of income and expenditure in Form-20 along with the nomination.</d>
ANNOUNCEMENT_FIRST_PART.UPAZILLA_ELECTION: (1) I hereby declare that I have consented to the above nomination and am eligible to be elected as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under section 8(1) of the Local Government (Upazila Parishad) Act, 1998 and am not disqualified for being elected or holding office as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under section 8(2) of the Local Government (Upazila Parishad) Act, 1998 and have not submitted nomination papers for election to more than one position. (2) I have attached an oath in the prescribed form with the nomination paper. (3) I have attached a statement of probable sources of income and probable expenditure for conducting my election expenses.
ANNOUNCEMENT_FIRST_PART.CITY_CORPORATION_ELECTION: <d>(1) I hereby declare that-</d><d>(a) I have consented to the above nomination and am eligible to be elected as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under Section 9(1) of the Local Government (City Corporation) Act, 2009.</d><d>(b) I am not disqualified to be elected or to remain as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under Section 9(1) of the Local Government (City Corporation) Act, 2009.</d><d>(c) I have not submitted nomination papers for more than one position in the election.</d><d>(2) I have attached an affidavit with the nomination paper.</d><d>(3) I have attached details of my election expenditure in Form-20A along with Form-20.</d>
ANNOUNCEMENT_FIRST_PART.MUNICIPALITY_ELECTION: <d>(1) I hereby declare that-</d><d>(a) I have consented to the above nomination and am eligible to be elected as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under Section 9(1) of the Local Government (City Corporation) Act, 2009.</d><d>(b) I am not disqualified to be elected or to remain as {{CANDIDATE_TYPE}} under Section 9(1) of the Local Government (City Corporation) Act, 2009.</d><d>(c) I have not submitted nomination papers for more than one position in the election.</d><d>(2) I have attached an affidavit with the nomination paper.</d><d>(3) I have attached details of my election expenditure in Form-20A along with Form-20.</d>
